Verses: 1 akkaalaththile Erodhuraajaa Sabaiyile Silaraith Thunbappaduththath Thodangi;
2 yovaanudaiya Sagodharanaagiya Yaakkobaip Pattayaththinaale Kolaiseydhaan.
3 adhu Yoodharukkup Piriyamaayirukkiradhendru Avan Kandu, Pedhuruvaiyum Pidikkaththodarndhaan. Appozhudhu Pulippillaadha Appappandigai Naatkalaayirundhadhu.

4 avanaip Pidiththuch Siraichchaalaiyile Vaiththu, Paskaapandigaikkup Pinbu Janangalukku Munbaaga Avanai Veliye Konduvaralaamendru Enni, Avanaik Kaakkumpadi Vaguppukku Naangu Porchchevagaraaga Erpaduththiya Naangu Vaguppugalin Vasamaaga Oppuviththaan.
5 appaiye Pedhuru Siraichchaalaiyile Kaakkappattirukkaiyil Sabaiyaar Avanukkaaga Dhevanai Nokki Ookkaththode Jebampanninaargal.

6 erodhu Avanai Veliye Konduvarumpadi Kuriththirundha Naalukku Mundhina Naal Raaththiriyile, Pedhuru Irandu Sangiligalinaale Kattappattu. Irandu Sevagar Naduve Niththiraipannikkondirundhaan; Kaavarkaararum Kadhavukku Munnirundhu Siraichchaalaiyaik Kaaththukkondirundhaargal.

7 appozhudhu Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Ange Vandhu Nindraan; Araiyile Velichcham Piragaasiththadhu, Avan Pedhuruvai Vilaavile Thatti, Seekkiramaai Ezhundhiru Endru Avanai Ezhuppinaan Avanudaiya Sangiligal Avan Kaigalilirundhu Vizhundhadhu.

8 thoodhan Avanai Nokki: Un Araiyaik Katti, Un Paadharatchaigalaith Thoduththukkol Endraan. Avan Andhappadiye Seydhaan. Thoodhan Pinnum Avanai Nokki: Un Vasthiraththaip Porththukkondu En Pinne Vaa Endraan.
9 andhappadiye Avan Purappattu Avanukkup Pinsendru, Thoodhanaal Seyyappattadhu Meyyendru Ariyaamal, Thaan Oru Dharisanangaangiradhaaga Ninaiththaan.

10 avargal Mudhalaangkaavalaiyum Irandaangkaavalaiyum Kadandhu, Nagaraththirkuppogira Iruppukkadhavandaiyile Vandhabodhu Adhu Thaanaai Avargalukkuth Thiravundadhu; Adhin Vazhiyaai Avargal Purappattu Oru Veedhi Neduga Nadandhuponaargal; Udane Thoodhan Avanai Vittuppoivittaan.

11 pedhuruvukkuth Thelivu Vandhabodhu: Erodhin Kaikkum Yoodhajanangalin Ennangalukkum Ennai Vidudhalaiyaakkumpadikkuk Karththar Thammudaiya Thoodhanai Anuppinaarendru Naan Ippozhudhu Meyyaai Arindhirukkiren Endraan.
12 avan Ippadi Nichchayiththukkondu, Maarku Ennum Perkonda Yovaanudaiya Thaayaagiya Mariyaal Veettukku Vandhaan; Ange Anegar Koodi Jebampannikkondirundhaargal.
13 pedhuru Vaasarkadhavaith Thattinabodhu Rodhai Ennum Perkonda Oru Pen Otrukketka Vandhaal.
14 aval Pedhuruvin Saththaththai Arindhu Sandhoshaththinaal Kadhavaith Thiravaamal, Ulleyodi, Pedhuru Vaasalukkumunne Nirkiraar Endru Ariviththaal.
15 avargal: Nee Pidhatrugiraai Endraargal. Avalo Avardhaanendru Urudhiyaaich Saadhiththaal. Appozhudhu Avargal: Avarudaiya Thoodhanaayirukkalaam Endraargal.
16 pedhuru Pinnum Thattikkondirundhaan. Avargal Thirandhabodhu Avanaik Kandu Biramiththaargal.

17 avargal Pesaamalirukkumpadi Avan Kaiyamarththi, Karththar Thannaik Kaavalilirundhu Vidudhalaiyaakkina Vidhaththai Avargalukku Vivariththu, Indhach Seydhiyai Yaakkobukkum Sagodhararukkum Ariviyungal Endru Solli; Purappattu, Veroru Idaththirkupponaan.
18 pozhudhu Vidindhapinbu Pedhuruvaik Kuriththuch Sevagarukkulle Undaana Kalakkam Konjamalla.

19 erodhu Avanaith Thedik Kaanaamarponabodhu, Kaavarkaararai Visaaranaiseydhu, Avargalaik Kolaiseyyumpadi Kattalaiyittu, Pinbu Yoodheyaa Dhesaththaivittuch Sesariyaa Pattanaththukkuppoi, Ange Vaasampanninaan.

20 akkaalaththile Erodhu Theeriyarperilum Seedhoniyar Perilum Migavung Kobamaayirundhaan. Thangal Dhesam Raajaavin Dhesaththinaal Poshikkappattapadiyinaal, Avargal Orumanappattu, Avanidaththil Vandhu, Raajaavin Veettu Visaaranaikkaaranaagiya Pilaaththuvaith Thangal Vasamaakkich Samaadhaanam Kettukkondaargal,
21 kuriththanaalile Erodhu Raajavasthiram Thariththukkondu, Singaasanaththin Mel Utkaarndhu, Avargalukkup Pirasangampanninaan.
22 appozhudhu Janangal Idhu Manushasaththamalla, Idhu Dhevasaththam Endru Aarppariththaargal.
23 avan Dhevanukku Magimaiyaich Seluththaadhapadiyinaal Udane Karththarudaiya Thoodhan Avanai Adiththaan; Avan Puzhuppuzhuththu Irandhaan.
24 dhevavasanam Valarndhu Perugitru.
25 barnabaavum Savulum Dharma Oozhiyaththai Niraivetrinapinbu Maarku Ennum Maruperkonda Yovaanaik Koottikkondu Erusalemaivittuth Thirumbivandhaargal.
